title: Hawaii state building codes; prohibitions
context: ยง107-26 Hawaii state building codes; prohibitions. In adopting the Hawaii state building codes, the council shall not adopt provisions that: (1) Relate to administrative, permitting, or enforcement and inspection procedures of each county; or (2) Conflict with chapters 444 and 464. [L 2007, c 82, pt of ยง2; am L 2014, c 164, ยง7]
